import React from "react"; import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Row, Col, NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' import SerachBox from './SerachBox' import SearchBox from "./SerachBox"; function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const dispatch = useDispatch() const {userInfo} = userLogin console.log(userInfo,"vijay sir"); const logoutHandler = ()=>{ dispatch(logout()) } return (
Shopping App
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ):( Login )} {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin &&( Users Products Orders )}
); } export default Header;
